stripped_text: When you install this program, load 3 power counters onto it. When it is empty, trash it. The first time each turn you make a successful run, you may remove 1 hosted power counter to sabotage 1. (The Corp trashes 1 card of their choice from HQ or the top of R&D.)

title: Nga
